SqlTable.SqlScriptCreate: CREATE TABLE [dbo].[CoreGridsColumns] ( [CoreGridsColumns_Ky] int IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL , [CoreGrids_Ky] int NULL , [CoreAttributes_Ky] int NULL , [CoreGridsColumns_Width] int NULL , [CoreGridsColumns_Order] int NULL , [CoreGridsColumns_Link] bit NULL , [CoreGridsColumns_Label] varchar(MAX) NULL , [CoreGridsColumns_Renderer] varchar(MAX) NULL , [CoreGridsColumns_UserInsert] int NULL , [CoreGridsColumns_UserUpdate] int NULL , [CoreGridsColumns_UserDelete] int NULL , [CoreGridsColumns_DateInsert] datetime NULL , [CoreGridsColumns_DateUpdate] datetime NULL , [CoreGridsColumns_DateDelete] datetime NULL ) ALTER TABLE [dbo].[CoreGridsColumns] ADD CONSTRAINT PK_CoreGridsColumns PRIMARY KEY ([CoreGridsColumns_Ky])
